alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Marion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion and southwestern Hamilton Counties through 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/... At 715 PM EDT/615 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jasper, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Jasper, Signal Mountain, Whitwell, Kimball, Ridgeside, Red Bank, Martin Springs, Lookout Mountain and Haletown (guild). MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
